actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1470.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #753 (337-40).
Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce discharged in Senate.

official_title: An Act to provide for a national wildlife refuge in the Minnesota River Valley, and for other purposes.
short_title: Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge Act

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1470) Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge Act - Establishes the Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge, Minnesota. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to construct within such refuge a wildlife interpretation and education center. Requires the Secretary to establish, in cooperation with the State, a wildlife recreation area. Requires the United States Fish and Wildlife Service and the Corps of Engineers to assist local authorities in designating sites for deposit of spoil material so as to minimize the disruption of wildlife and scenic values within the refuge.

titles.title: Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge Act
A bill to establish the Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge.
An Act to provide for a national wildlife refuge in the Minnesota River Valley, and for other purposes.
